name: nef-backend
description: NEF Backend - Sistema de gestão de equipe

scripts.check-env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Environment variables loaded:', Object.keys(process.env).filter(k => k.startsWith('SUPABASE') || k.startsWith('NODE') || k.startsWith('PORT')))"
scripts.db:test: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { createClient } = require('@supabase/supabase-js'); const supabase = createClient(process.env.SUPABASE_URL, process.env.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY); console.log('✅ Supabase connection test passed')"
scripts.health: node -e "const http = require('http'); const options = { hostname: 'localhost', port: process.env.PORT || 3001, path: '/health', timeout: 5000 }; const req = http.request(options, (res) => { console.log('✅ Backend health check passed'); }); req.on('error', () => { console.log('❌ Backend not running'); }); req.end();"
